LanguageData.BlondThrumboLeather.label: blond thrumbo fur
LanguageData.BlondThrumboLeather.description: Furry pelt of a blond thrumbo. Luxurious and extraordinarily durable. Used for the high-quality crafts for its insulation. This fur is well-valued in all sectors.
LanguageData.GingerThrumboLeather.label: ginger thrumbo fur
LanguageData.GingerThrumboLeather.description: Furry pelt of a ginger thrumbo. Luxurious and extraordinarily durable. Used for the high-quality crafts for its insulation. This fur is well-valued in all sectors.
